selectLocalByPerson: SELECT lc.na_local, rt.de_route, st.na_street FROM local.local lc INNER JOIN local.person_local pl ON pl.id_local = lc.id_local INNER JOIN local.route rt ON rt.id_route = lc.id_route INNER JOIN local.street st ON st.id_street = rt.id_street WHERE pl.id_person = $1
selectRouteByLocal: SELECT rt.de_route, st.na_street, mp.na_municipality FROM local.route rt INNER JOIN local.local lc ON lc.id_route = rt.id_route INNER JOIN local.street st ON st.id_street = rt.id_street INNER JOIN local.municipality mp ON mp.id_municipality = st.id_municipality WHERE lc.id_local = $1
selectAllRouteLocal: SELECT lc.na_local, rt.de_route FROM local.route rt INNER JOIN local.local lc ON rt.id_route = lc.id_route
selectLocalByRoute: SELECT pn.na_person, pn.ln_person, lc.na_local FROM local.local lc INNER JOIN local.person_local pl ON pl.id_local = lc.id_local INNER JOIN local.route rt ON rt.id_route = lc.id_route INNER JOIN person.person pn ON pn.id_person = pl.id_person WHERE rt.id_route = $1
selectAllLocal: SELECT lc.id_local, lc.na_local FROM local.local lc
selectAllRoute: SELECT rt.id_route, rt.de_route FROM local.route rt
updateLocal: UPDATE local.local SET na_local WHERE id_local = $1
updateRoute: UPDATE local.route SET de_route WHERE id_route = $1
